title: MFM Presents: Waiting for Impact - Episode 1: "I've Been Thinking About You"
description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of Waiting for Impact: A Dave Holmes Passion Project, a new limited series on Exactly Right. Dave Holmes has been obsessed with a pop culture disappearance for decades: what ever happened to Sudden Impact, the boy band who were featured in Boyz II Men's "Motownphilly" music video and then vanished? Before we dive into the mystery, we'll need to take a good look at life in 1991, when the music industry was flush, and what it was like to be a pop culture obsessive in a time before the internet. Plus, are we closer to the East Coast Family than we thought?

Listen and subscribe to Waiting for Impact on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
